text:
We have heard endless stories where Shah Rukh Khan has gone an extra mile to make his fans happy. He might be one of the busiest actors in the country but Shah Rukh Khan has his heart in the right place.
Agencies
And now, he has again managed to make two of his special fans happy with his sweet gesture. A Mumbai couple tied the knot and the first thing they did after that was to visit Khan's infamous Mumbai Bungalow, Mannat.
Agencies
The couple posed for a picture and they shared on Twitter by writing, “They say visit the temple after you are hitched, we did it right!”
Don't Miss 343 SHARES 555 SHARES 263 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
God Bless you. https://t.co/A0a7CQ2PXQ — Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) December 14, 2018
Since they tagged SRK in their tweet, the superstar was able to see this and wrote 'God bless you' ! SRK's reply is a sweet one as he extended wishes for the newlyweds. While Khan was obviously not a part of the wedding, he made sure they feel special.
title: SRK Extends Warm Wishes To A Newly Married Couple Who Visited Mannat After Tying The Knot!
description: And now, he has again managed to make two of his special fans happy with his sweet gesture. A Mumbai couple tied the knot and the first thing they did after that was to visit Khan's infamous Mumbai Bungalow, Mannat. The couple posed for a picture and they shared on Twitter by writing, “They say visit the temple after you are hitched, we did it right!”
